{{Wired embedded system |brand=Barracuda |model=CloudGen Firewall |revision=F12a (BNHW00A/BNGF12a) |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=AEWIN |manuf_model=SCB-6998A |manuf_rev=BC2 |availability=currently shipping |price=590 |pcb_id=CB-6988 REV A3 |type=Router Firewall |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Celeron |cpu1_model=N3350 |cpu1_cspeed=1.1-2.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25U6473FM21-10G |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, mSATA, SATA 3.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, RJ-45 console |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=WGI211AT |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=WGI211AT |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WGI211AT (x3) |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=5 |addl_chips=2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6791D;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;2;,,, DisplayPort to VGA Converter;Chrontel;CH7517;;1;,,, Parallel Port Single Termination Network;STMicro;ST1284;;1;,,, Dual Output 3 & 2 Phase Controller w/Single Intel Proprietary Interface;ON Semi;NCP81243;;1;,,, Eight Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB803D;;1; 16V 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter w/Adjustable Current Limit;MPS;MPQ8633A;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;National Semiconductor;LM358;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;3;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel Enhancement Mode Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP6923GMT;;1;,,, 30V 160A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS8820;;1;,,, 30V 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7682;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel HexFET Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4435DY;;1;,,, Dual D-Type Flip-Flop w/Set and Reset;NXP;74LVC74AD;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, power switch, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=Grub;0.97;; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.38.7;Barracuda Cloudgen Firewall 7.1.3-061; |default_ip=192.168.200.200 |default_user=root |default_pass=ngf1r3wall |oui_eth=00:0D:48 }} {{TagLine|Barracuda NextGen Firewall F12a}} :[https://www.barraguard.com/NG-Firewall-F12.asp Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://campus.barracuda.com/product/cloudgenfirewall/doc/78152895/f12-revision-a/ Product information]
"CB-6988 REV. A3" is silkscreened on both sides of board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] N3350 @1.1-2.4GHz (Dual-Core) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3L) DRAM *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash, 128GB SATA SSD *PCI: 1x PCIe, 1x mSATA slots *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Barracuda NG Firewall F12a Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Barracuda NG Firewall F12a Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Barracuda NG Firewall F12a Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
